name: Name
loginEmailSent: An e-mail has been sent to you allowing you to login
noEmailProvidedLoggingIn: Email address has not been verified.
subscribeToTheClothingLoopNewsletter: Subscribe to The Clothing Loop newsletter
areYouALoopAdmin: Are you a Loop Admin? Enter your email below to login.
notPartOfTheClothingLoopYet: Not part of The Clothing Loop yet,
yourClosetIsAboutToBecomeAWholeLotMoreSu: Your closet is about to become a whole lot more sustainable, more fun and more YOU!
weWillReplySoon: Someone from our team will be in touch with you soon
clickToSetLoopLocation: Click on the map to set the approximate location of your loop. A dot will appear, you can manually change the radius in the field below.
clickToChangeLoopLocation: Click on the map to change the location of the loop
ifNoSizesAreShowing: If no sizes are showing, the participant didn't select any interested size when joining.
ThereIsNoActiveLoopInYourRegion: There is no active Loop in your region... but there should be! Would you like to start one? It is easy and a lot of fun! Click below, sign in, and we will send you all the information to get you started.
clothingTypePopoverMessage: The Clothing Loop is open to all people, regardless of the gender they feel is best representing their identity. Therefore, we decided to split clothes into normative gender lines influenced by the fashion industry, and leave the choice which one to join up to you.
clothingSizesPopoverMessage: We recommend to start* with either: - A mix of items from size 36 - 42 (Small - Medium - Large). - A plus size loop for sizes XL XXL XXXL and up if relevant. In our experience, bags with these mixed sizes ranges work very well, as sizes vary per brand, era and country anyway. *If needed, loops can later on always be tailored to a more narrow size range.
adminSwitcherMessage: Do you want to set everything up, but are you not quite ready for launching? Just keep this slider set to invisible for a little longer! Don’t wait too long though, as someone else may beat you to the chase and start a loop in the same area. And even though there can be multiple loops in the same area, it may cause a bit of confusion.
migratingDutchLoops: We are in the process of migrating all Dutch loops into this platform. If you are in the Netherlands and want to join, please sign up using the link below.
byDonatingACupOfCoffee: By donating a cup of coffee to the creators we can help you find your next sweater
thankYouForStartingThisLoop: Thank you for starting this loop!
youAreUnlockingTheClothesSwapPotential: You are unlocking the clothes swap potential for so many people in your neighbourhood, we hope you are as excited about this as we are!
hostConfirmationEmailIsOnItsWay: Our confirmation email is on its way. Please verify before logging in.
confirmationEmailIsOnItsWay: Our confirmation email is on its way.
swapDontShopMessage: Want to dress more sustainably? Clear out your closet and surprise others with items of clothing that you no longer wear? Spice up your wardrobe without spending a dime, or simply connect with neighbours? Look no further! The Clothing Loop is an initiative that allows people to easily swap clothes with others in their own neighbourhood. It’s fun, free and sustainable!
joinALoopMessage: Want to join? We’d love to have you! Check our map and sign up for a Loop in your neighbourhood. No active Loop to join in your area yet? We'll help you set one up! Joining is free and open to everyone.
getReadyToSwapMessage: The host of your local Loop will add you to the route as soon as possible, and then it is only a matter of time before the first bag will arrive! Find something you like, and donate something that no longer suits you, before you pass the bag onto the next person on the list. Don’t forget to share a picture of your newfound treasure with the group!
fromLocalLockdownToSuccess: From local lockdown initiative to international success
fromLocalLockdownToSuccessMessage: The Clothing Loop started in Amsterdam. Within one year this local initiative became the powerful movement it is today; we saved mountains of clothing, neighbours got to know each other and we created real behavioural change towards textile consumption.
wedLoveToHearFromYou: We'd love to hear from you!
smallActsCanChangeTheWorld: "Small acts, when multiplied by millions of people, can change the world" Howard Zinn
weAreWorkingOnMakingTheClothingLoopBette: We are continuously working on making The Clothing Loop better, more widespread and more impactful. Click here if you want to help us do so!
currentlyWeAreDevelopingOurPlatform: Currently we are developing our platform as best as we can. Right now we have the website up and running on your desktop and soon it will be available for mobile. Hang in there
troublesWithTheSignupContactUs: Troubles with the signup? Contact us
